title: Can someone please gift me some RP
body: Hey guys, I play league casually and I don't have enough money to get riot points, I really want a skin for my favourite champion- yasuo, if someone could gift me some that would be really caring and kind and I understand if you don't want to because it's hard to just give away Rp like that. My name is gabepasta on Ocenia of course and it would be very courteous for someone to do such a thing. Thank you everyone I hope you have an awesome time playing my favourite game league of legends!

replies.body:
No one likes a yasuo player, they come in 2 bunches nothing else, good and carry or they feed hard and lose game for team. And even for every 1 good yasuo there is 1 bad, the way that 1 good carries makes people hate yasuos in general.

So unless someone with a heart of gold, dipped in honey surrounded by caring mothers comes along its unlikely you will get it.
I never said I was going to get a skin for yasuo, in fact I don't even play him that much, but I just really want at least 1 skin for my favourite champions.

> [{quoted}](name=gabepasta,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=T3wzB7Zx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-24T06:54:29.332+0000)
>
> I never said I was going to get a skin for yasuo, in fact I don't even play him that much, but I just really want at least 1 skin for my favourite champions.

 I really want a skin for my favourite champion- yasuo, if someone could gift me

I win. And thats even after you changed the content in your post
Sorry kid there's a very unlikely chance some random is going to give you RP like that, might need to steal your moms credit card or something

I play League casually and I have over 70 skins...

My point is.......I should spend my money more wisely...
